content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":254572,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんか自分が無視されたようでむかつくランスは乱入","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance, feeling irritated as if he was being ignored, barges in."},{"lineNumber":254573,"originalJapaneseLine":"姉妹は対決を邪魔された事で、先にこいつを倒そうと一致団結（共通の敵が出ると仲良しになれる）","translatedEnglishLine":"The sisters, having their confrontation interrupted, unite to defeat this guy first (common enemies make friends)."},{"lineNumber":254574,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハウゼル、サイゼルのタッグと戦う","translatedEnglishLine":"They fight the tag team of Hauzel and Saizel."},{"lineNumber":254575,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞ボス戦、サイゼル＆ハウゼル","translatedEnglishLine":"Boss Battle: Saizel & Hauzel."},{"lineNumber":254576,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tほぼゲームオーバールート","translatedEnglishLine":"Almost a guaranteed game over route."},{"lineNumber":254577,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tもし勝てたらのＩＦルートも後で用意","translatedEnglishLine":"An 'If' route is also prepared later if you manage to win."},{"lineNumber":254578,"originalJapaneseLine":"しばらく姉妹の戦いが続く、炎ｖｓ氷","translatedEnglishLine":"The sisters' battle goes on for a while, Fire vs Ice."},{"lineNumber":254579,"originalJapaneseLine":"なかなか決着が付かない、いつまで戦っているんだこいつら","translatedEnglishLine":"No easy resolution; how long are these two going to keep fighting?"},{"lineNumber":254580,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうですね、ほっとけば２．３日続くかもしれません。こまったものです","translatedEnglishLine":"That's right. If left alone, it might continue for two or three days. Quite troublesome."},{"lineNumber":254581,"originalJapaneseLine":"とランスの横で火炎書士が現れて言う","translatedEnglishLine":"At that moment, a Fire Librarian appears beside Lance and speaks."},{"lineNumber":254582,"originalJapaneseLine":"だれだお前は・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Who are you...?"},{"lineNumber":254583,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスの問いかけは無視して、大声で","translatedEnglishLine":"Ignoring Lance's question, loudly says,"},{"lineNumber":254584,"originalJapaneseLine":"ケイブリスさん、こっちですよーと叫ぶ","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Keblis-san, this way!\" she shouts."},{"lineNumber":254585,"originalJapaneseLine":"げっと慌ててサイゼルは逃げて行く","translatedEnglishLine":"Startled, Saizel hurriedly flees."},{"lineNumber":254586,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":254587,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハウゼルと火炎書士の会話。","translatedEnglishLine":"A conversation between Hauzel and the Fire Librarian."},{"lineNumber":254588,"originalJapaneseLine":"作戦中ですよ、おねーさんと遊んでいる場合ではありません","translatedEnglishLine":"We're in the middle of a mission; this is no time to be playing with your big sister."},{"lineNumber":254589,"originalJapaneseLine":"それに、借りている本の返却期限、また忘れていますよ","translatedEnglishLine":"Also, you’ve forgotten the return deadline on the book you borrowed again."},{"lineNumber":254590,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラが会話に入る、どういう事、なんでケイブリスなんかにー","translatedEnglishLine":"Satera joins the conversation, asking what’s going on and why Keblis is involved."},{"lineNumber":254591,"originalJapaneseLine":"返答どうしようかと、なんて言えばいいか悩んでいると","translatedEnglishLine":"Unsure how to respond and what to say,"},{"lineNumber":254592,"originalJapaneseLine":"火炎書士が答える、貴方こそ魔人なのに人間側に付くというのはそれこそ裏切りでなくて","translatedEnglishLine":"The Fire Librarian answers, 'Isn't it true betrayal for you, a demon, to side with humans?'"},{"lineNumber":254593,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスも会話に入り混んで、なんだかんだで戦闘になる","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance jumps into the conversation, and before long it escalates into a fight."},{"lineNumber":254594,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦闘が始まってしばらくして　ハウゼルの持つアラームが鳴る","translatedEnglishLine":"After the battle starts, Hauzel's alarm goes off."},{"lineNumber":254595,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦闘は時間切れで終わる","translatedEnglishLine":"The fight ends due to time running out."},{"lineNumber":254596,"originalJapaneseLine":"あっ・・図書館の時間","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah... it's library closing time."},{"lineNumber":254597,"originalJapaneseLine":"火炎司書、はい、閉館時間です。","translatedEnglishLine":"Fire Librarian: Yes, it’s closing time."},{"lineNumber":254598,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハウゼル様はたしか本日までに返さないといけない本が","translatedEnglishLine":"Hauzel-sama has a book that must be returned by today."},{"lineNumber":254599,"originalJapaneseLine":"ありますね。","translatedEnglishLine":"Indeed."},{"lineNumber":254600,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・・今、忙しいし・・","translatedEnglishLine":"...I’m busy right now..."},{"lineNumber":254601,"originalJapaneseLine":"延滞が発生すると、１ヶ月は入室禁止となります","translatedEnglishLine":"If you incur a late fee, you will be banned from entering for one month."},{"lineNumber":254602,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"......"},{"lineNumber":254603,"originalJapaneseLine":"あ、・・とあわてて戦場から逃げていくハウゼル","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah... Hauzel hurriedly flees from the battlefield."},{"lineNumber":254604,"originalJapaneseLine":"その際、ハウゼルは一冊の本を落とした。","translatedEnglishLine":"In the process, Hauzel drops a book."},{"lineNumber":254605,"originalJapaneseLine":"その後、少し戦ったランス達","translatedEnglishLine":"Afterwards, Lance and the others fight a bit more."},{"lineNumber":254606,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・ん、何戦っているんだ。一般兵じゃあるまいし","translatedEnglishLine":"...Hm, what are you fighting? You’re not a common soldier after all."},{"lineNumber":254607,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺様の部隊は特別なのだ、雑魚相当はリーザス軍に任せて帰るぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"My unit is special. Leave the small fry to the Leazas army and let's head back."},{"lineNumber":254608,"originalJapaneseLine":"その夜、リーザス軍の陣地　ランス達","translatedEnglishLine":"That night, at the Leazas army camp, Lance and the others."},{"lineNumber":254609,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラによるハウゼルの説明その２","translatedEnglishLine":"Satera’s explanation about Hauzel, part 2."},{"lineNumber":254610,"originalJapaneseLine":"ここでハウゼルが本好きという事を知る","translatedEnglishLine":"Here we learn that Hauzel loves books."},{"lineNumber":254611,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハウゼルが落とした本","translatedEnglishLine":"The book Hauzel dropped."},{"lineNumber":254612,"originalJapaneseLine":"図書館の本です、「ドラゴンパッチ６巻」","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s a library book: \"Dragon Patch Volume 6.\""},{"lineNumber":254613,"originalJapaneseLine":"貸し出しリストは　ハウゼル、ハウゼル、ハウゼル　３回も借りていますね","translatedEnglishLine":"The lending list shows Hauzel borrowing it three times."},{"lineNumber":254614,"originalJapaneseLine":"よほど好きなんですね。","translatedEnglishLine":"He must really like it."},{"lineNumber":254615,"originalJapaneseLine":"サチコが説明、私も好きです。大人気です。","translatedEnglishLine":"Sachiko explains: I like it too. It’s very popular."},{"lineNumber":254616,"originalJapaneseLine":"次が最終巻なのですが、続きがとても気になる、ファンの間では展開予想で喧嘩になるほどです","translatedEnglishLine":"The next volume is the last one, but the continuation is so intriguing that fans even fight over predictions."},{"lineNumber":254617,"originalJapaneseLine":"でも、もう世の中がこんな風になったから続きは無理かもしれませんね。","translatedEnglishLine":"But now that the world has become like this, continuing the series might be impossible."},{"lineNumber":254618,"originalJapaneseLine":"作者はドエススキー","translatedEnglishLine":"The author is Doesusuki."},{"lineNumber":254619,"originalJapaneseLine":"次の日の合戦","translatedEnglishLine":"The battle the next day."},{"lineNumber":254620,"originalJapaneseLine":"リーザス軍と魔軍の戦い、ランスも参加します。","translatedEnglishLine":"The fight between the Leazas army and the demon army, Lance participates too."},{"lineNumber":254621,"originalJapaneseLine":"よーし、今日こそはハウゼルを倒すぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, today I’m definitely going to defeat Hauzel."},{"lineNumber":254622,"originalJapaneseLine":"昨日は逃げられたが・・今回は逃がさない","translatedEnglishLine":"He escaped yesterday... but this time, I won’t let him get away."},{"lineNumber":254623,"originalJapaneseLine":"前線基地でのシーンは　エクス、リックとか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Scenes at the frontline base with Ex, Rick, and others..."},{"lineNumber":254624,"originalJapaneseLine":"とはりきって戦場に入ります","translatedEnglishLine":"Brimming with enthusiasm, they enter the battlefield."},{"lineNumber":254625,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハウゼルを発見、戦闘をしかけようとするが","translatedEnglishLine":"They spot Hauzel and try to initiate combat,"},{"lineNumber":254626,"originalJapaneseLine":"きょろきょろしているだけで、ランスを無視してさーっと飛んでいってしまう","translatedEnglishLine":"but Hauzel just looks around, ignores Lance, and swiftly flies away."},{"lineNumber":254627,"originalJapaneseLine":"こらーまてー","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey—wait!"},{"lineNumber":254628,"originalJapaneseLine":"これはどういう作戦だ、何かやる気なのか？　くそっ、追いかけるぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"What kind of strategy is this? Is he up to something? Damn it, I’m chasing him!"},{"lineNumber":254629,"originalJapaneseLine":"（実は本を捜しているハウゼルさん）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Actually, Hauzel is searching for a book.)"},{"lineNumber":254630,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦場の少し離れた所","translatedEnglishLine":"A spot a little apart from the battlefield."},{"lineNumber":254631,"originalJapaneseLine":"火炎司書とユキちゃんが話をしている","translatedEnglishLine":"The Fire Librarian and Yuki-chan are having a conversation."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんか自分が無視されたようでむかつくランスは乱入
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance, feeling irritated as if he was being ignored, barges in.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 姉妹は対決を邪魔された事で、先にこいつを倒そうと一致団結（共通の敵が出ると仲良しになれる）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The sisters, having their confrontation interrupted, unite to defeat this guy first (common enemies make friends).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウゼル、サイゼルのタッグと戦う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They fight the tag team of Hauzel and Saizel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞ボス戦、サイゼル＆ハウゼル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Boss Battle: Saizel & Hauzel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほぼゲームオーバールート
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Almost a guaranteed game over route.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もし勝てたらのＩＦルートも後で用意
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An 'If' route is also prepared later if you manage to win.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しばらく姉妹の戦いが続く、炎ｖｓ氷
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The sisters' battle goes on for a while, Fire vs Ice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なかなか決着が付かない、いつまで戦っているんだこいつら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No easy resolution; how long are these two going to keep fighting?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうですね、ほっとけば２．３日続くかもしれません。こまったものです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's right. If left alone, it might continue for two or three days. Quite troublesome.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とランスの横で火炎書士が現れて言う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment, a Fire Librarian appears beside Lance and speaks.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だれだお前は・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Who are you...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの問いかけは無視して、大声で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ignoring Lance's question, loudly says,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスさん、こっちですよーと叫ぶ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Keblis-san, this way!" she shouts.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: げっと慌ててサイゼルは逃げて行く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Startled, Saizel hurriedly flees.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウゼルと火炎書士の会話。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A conversation between Hauzel and the Fire Librarian.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 作戦中ですよ、おねーさんと遊んでいる場合ではありません
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We're in the middle of a mission; this is no time to be playing with your big sister.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに、借りている本の返却期限、また忘れていますよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, you’ve forgotten the return deadline on the book you borrowed again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラが会話に入る、どういう事、なんでケイブリスなんかにー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera joins the conversation, asking what’s going on and why Keblis is involved.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 返答どうしようかと、なんて言えばいいか悩んでいると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unsure how to respond and what to say,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 火炎書士が答える、貴方こそ魔人なのに人間側に付くというのはそれこそ裏切りでなくて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Fire Librarian answers, 'Isn't it true betrayal for you, a demon, to side with humans?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスも会話に入り混んで、なんだかんだで戦闘になる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance jumps into the conversation, and before long it escalates into a fight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘が始まってしばらくして　ハウゼルの持つアラームが鳴る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After the battle starts, Hauzel's alarm goes off.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘は時間切れで終わる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The fight ends due to time running out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ・・図書館の時間
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah... it's library closing time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 火炎司書、はい、閉館時間です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fire Librarian: Yes, it’s closing time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウゼル様はたしか本日までに返さないといけない本が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hauzel-sama has a book that must be returned by today.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ありますね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Indeed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・・今、忙しいし・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...I’m busy right now...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 延滞が発生すると、１ヶ月は入室禁止となります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you incur a late fee, you will be banned from entering for one month.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あ、・・とあわてて戦場から逃げていくハウゼル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah... Hauzel hurriedly flees from the battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その際、ハウゼルは一冊の本を落とした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the process, Hauzel drops a book.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その後、少し戦ったランス達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Afterwards, Lance and the others fight a bit more.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・ん、何戦っているんだ。一般兵じゃあるまいし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Hm, what are you fighting? You’re not a common soldier after all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様の部隊は特別なのだ、雑魚相当はリーザス軍に任せて帰るぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My unit is special. Leave the small fry to the Leazas army and let's head back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その夜、リーザス軍の陣地　ランス達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That night, at the Leazas army camp, Lance and the others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラによるハウゼルの説明その２
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera’s explanation about Hauzel, part 2.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここでハウゼルが本好きという事を知る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here we learn that Hauzel loves books.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウゼルが落とした本
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The book Hauzel dropped.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 図書館の本です、「ドラゴンパッチ６巻」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s a library book: "Dragon Patch Volume 6."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貸し出しリストは　ハウゼル、ハウゼル、ハウゼル　３回も借りていますね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The lending list shows Hauzel borrowing it three times.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よほど好きなんですね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He must really like it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サチコが説明、私も好きです。大人気です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sachiko explains: I like it too. It’s very popular.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次が最終巻なのですが、続きがとても気になる、ファンの間では展開予想で喧嘩になるほどです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The next volume is the last one, but the continuation is so intriguing that fans even fight over predictions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも、もう世の中がこんな風になったから続きは無理かもしれませんね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But now that the world has become like this, continuing the series might be impossible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 作者はドエススキー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The author is Doesusuki.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次の日の合戦
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battle the next day.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス軍と魔軍の戦い、ランスも参加します。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The fight between the Leazas army and the demon army, Lance participates too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よーし、今日こそはハウゼルを倒すぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, today I’m definitely going to defeat Hauzel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昨日は逃げられたが・・今回は逃がさない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He escaped yesterday... but this time, I won’t let him get away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前線基地でのシーンは　エクス、リックとか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Scenes at the frontline base with Ex, Rick, and others...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とはりきって戦場に入ります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Brimming with enthusiasm, they enter the battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウゼルを発見、戦闘をしかけようとするが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They spot Hauzel and try to initiate combat,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きょろきょろしているだけで、ランスを無視してさーっと飛んでいってしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but Hauzel just looks around, ignores Lance, and swiftly flies away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こらーまてー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey—wait!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これはどういう作戦だ、何かやる気なのか？　くそっ、追いかけるぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What kind of strategy is this? Is he up to something? Damn it, I’m chasing him!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （実は本を捜しているハウゼルさん）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Actually, Hauzel is searching for a book.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場の少し離れた所
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A spot a little apart from the battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 火炎司書とユキちゃんが話をしている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Fire Librarian and Yuki-chan are having a conversation.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

Hauzel hurriedly flees from the battlefield."},{"lineNumber":254604,"originalJapaneseLine":"その際、ハウゼルは一冊の本を落とした。","translatedEnglishLine":"In the process, Hauzel drops a book."},{"lineNumber":254605,"originalJapaneseLine":"その後、少し戦ったランス達","translatedEnglishLine":"Afterwards, Lance and the others fight a bit more."},{"lineNumber":254606,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・ん、何戦っているんだ。一般兵じゃあるまいし","translatedEnglishLine":"...Hm, what are you fighting? You’re not a common soldier after all."},{"lineNumber":254607,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺様の部隊は特別なのだ、雑魚相当はリーザス軍に任せて帰るぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"My unit is special. Leave the small fry to the Leazas army and let's head back."},{"lineNumber":254608,"originalJapaneseLine":"その夜、リーザス軍の陣地　ランス達","translatedEnglishLine":"That night, at the Leazas army camp, Lance and the others."},{"lineNumber":254609,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラによるハウゼルの説明その２","translatedEnglishLine":"Satera’s explanation about Hauzel, part 2."},{"lineNumber":254610,"originalJapaneseLine":"ここでハウゼルが本好きという事を知る","translatedEnglishLine":"Here we learn that Hauzel loves books."},{"lineNumber":254611,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハウゼルが落とした本","translatedEnglishLine":"The book Hauzel dropped."},{"lineNumber":254612,"originalJapaneseLine":"図書館の本です、「ドラゴンパッチ６巻」","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s a library book: \"Dragon Patch Volume 6.\""},{"lineNumber":254613,"originalJapaneseLine":"貸し出しリストは　ハウゼル、ハウゼル、ハウゼル　３回も借りていますね","translatedEnglishLine":"The lending list shows Hauzel borrowing it three times."},{"lineNumber":254614,"originalJapaneseLine":"よほど好きなんですね。","translatedEnglishLine":"He must really like it."},{"lineNumber":254615,"originalJapaneseLine":"サチコが説明、私も好きです。大人気です。","translatedEnglishLine":"Sachiko explains: I like it too. It’s very popular."},{"lineNumber":254616,"originalJapaneseLine":"次が最終巻なのですが、続きがとても気になる、ファンの間では展開予想で喧嘩になるほどです","translatedEnglishLine":"The next volume is the last one, but the continuation is so intriguing that fans even fight over predictions."},{"lineNumber":254617,"originalJapaneseLine":"でも、もう世の中がこんな風になったから続きは無理かもしれませんね。","translatedEnglishLine":"But now that the world has become like this, continuing the series might be impossible."},{"lineNumber":254618,"originalJapaneseLine":"作者はドエススキー","translatedEnglishLine":"The author is Doesusuki."},{"lineNumber":254619,"originalJapaneseLine":"次の日の合戦","translatedEnglishLine":"The battle the next day."},{"lineNumber":254620,"originalJapaneseLine":"リーザス軍と魔軍の戦い、ランスも参加します。","translatedEnglishLine":"The fight between the Leazas army and the demon army, Lance participates too."},{"lineNumber":254621,"originalJapaneseLine":"よーし、今日こそはハウゼルを倒すぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, today I’m definitely going to defeat Hauzel."},{"lineNumber":254622,"originalJapaneseLine":"昨日は逃げられたが・・今回は逃がさない","translatedEnglishLine":"He escaped yesterday... but this time, I won’t let him get away."},{"lineNumber":254623,"originalJapaneseLine":"前線基地でのシーンは　エクス、リックとか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Scenes at the frontline base with Ex, Rick, and others..."},{"lineNumber":254624,"originalJapaneseLine":"とはりきって戦場に入ります","translatedEnglishLine":"Brimming with enthusiasm, they enter the battlefield."},{"lineNumber":254625,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハウゼルを発見、戦闘をしかけようとするが","translatedEnglishLine":"They spot Hauzel and try to initiate combat,"},{"lineNumber":254626,"originalJapaneseLine":"きょろきょろしているだけで、ランスを無視してさーっと飛んでいってしまう","translatedEnglishLine":"but Hauzel just looks around, ignores Lance, and swiftly flies away."},{"lineNumber":254627,"originalJapaneseLine":"こらーまてー","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey—wait!"},{"lineNumber":254628,"originalJapaneseLine":"これはどういう作戦だ、何かやる気なのか？　くそっ、追いかけるぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"What kind of strategy is this? Is he up to something? Damn it, I’m chasing him!"},{"lineNumber":254629,"originalJapaneseLine":"（実は本を捜しているハウゼルさん）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Actually, Hauzel is searching for a book.)"},{"lineNumber":254630,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦場の少し離れた所","translatedEnglishLine":"A spot a little apart from the battlefield."},{"lineNumber":254631,"originalJapaneseLine":"火炎司書とユキちゃんが話をしている","translatedEnglishLine":"The Fire Librarian and Yuki-chan are having a conversation."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんか自分が無視されたようでむかつくランスは乱入
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance, feeling irritated as if he was being ignored, barges in.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 姉妹は対決を邪魔された事で、先にこいつを倒そうと一致団結（共通の敵が出ると仲良しになれる）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The sisters, having their confrontation interrupted, unite to defeat this guy first (common enemies make friends).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウゼル、サイゼルのタッグと戦う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They fight the tag team of Hauzel and Saizel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞ボス戦、サイゼル＆ハウゼル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Boss Battle: Saizel & Hauzel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほぼゲームオーバールート
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Almost a guaranteed game over route.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もし勝てたらのＩＦルートも後で用意
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An 'If' route is also prepared later if you manage to win.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しばらく姉妹の戦いが続く、炎ｖｓ氷
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The sisters' battle goes on for a while, Fire vs Ice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なかなか決着が付かない、いつまで戦っているんだこいつら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No easy resolution; how long are these two going to keep fighting?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうですね、ほっとけば２．３日続くかもしれません。こまったものです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's right. If left alone, it might continue for two or three days. Quite troublesome.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とランスの横で火炎書士が現れて言う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment, a Fire Librarian appears beside Lance and speaks.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だれだお前は・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Who are you...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの問いかけは無視して、大声で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ignoring Lance's question, loudly says,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスさん、こっちですよーと叫ぶ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Keblis-san, this way!" she shouts.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: げっと慌ててサイゼルは逃げて行く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Startled, Saizel hurriedly flees.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウゼルと火炎書士の会話。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A conversation between Hauzel and the Fire Librarian.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 作戦中ですよ、おねーさんと遊んでいる場合ではありません
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We're in the middle of a mission; this is no time to be playing with your big sister.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに、借りている本の返却期限、また忘れていますよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, you’ve forgotten the return deadline on the book you borrowed again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラが会話に入る、どういう事、なんでケイブリスなんかにー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera joins the conversation, asking what’s going on and why Keblis is involved.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 返答どうしようかと、なんて言えばいいか悩んでいると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unsure how to respond and what to say,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 火炎書士が答える、貴方こそ魔人なのに人間側に付くというのはそれこそ裏切りでなくて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Fire Librarian answers, 'Isn't it true betrayal for you, a demon, to side with humans?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスも会話に入り混んで、なんだかんだで戦闘になる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance jumps into the conversation, and before long it escalates into a fight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘が始まってしばらくして　ハウゼルの持つアラームが鳴る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After the battle starts, Hauzel's alarm goes off.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘は時間切れで終わる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The fight ends due to time running out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ・・図書館の時間
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah... it's library closing time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 火炎司書、はい、閉館時間です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fire Librarian: Yes, it’s closing time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウゼル様はたしか本日までに返さないといけない本が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hauzel-sama has a book that must be returned by today.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ありますね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Indeed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・・今、忙しいし・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...I’m busy right now...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 延滞が発生すると、１ヶ月は入室禁止となります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you incur a late fee, you will be banned from entering for one month.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あ、・・とあわてて戦場から逃げていくハウゼル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah... Hauzel hurriedly flees from the battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その際、ハウゼルは一冊の本を落とした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the process, Hauzel drops a book.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その後、少し戦ったランス達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Afterwards, Lance and the others fight a bit more.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・ん、何戦っているんだ。一般兵じゃあるまいし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Hm, what are you fighting? You’re not a common soldier after all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様の部隊は特別なのだ、雑魚相当はリーザス軍に任せて帰るぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My unit is special. Leave the small fry to the Leazas army and let's head back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その夜、リーザス軍の陣地　ランス達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That night, at the Leazas army camp, Lance and the others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラによるハウゼルの説明その２
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera’s explanation about Hauzel, part 2.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここでハウゼルが本好きという事を知る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here we learn that Hauzel loves books.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウゼルが落とした本
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The book Hauzel dropped.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 図書館の本です、「ドラゴンパッチ６巻」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s a library book: "Dragon Patch Volume 6."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貸し出しリストは　ハウゼル、ハウゼル、ハウゼル　３回も借りていますね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The lending list shows Hauzel borrowing it three times.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よほど好きなんですね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He must really like it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サチコが説明、私も好きです。大人気です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sachiko explains: I like it too. It’s very popular.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次が最終巻なのですが、続きがとても気になる、ファンの間では展開予想で喧嘩になるほどです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The next volume is the last one, but the continuation is so intriguing that fans even fight over predictions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも、もう世の中がこんな風になったから続きは無理かもしれませんね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But now that the world has become like this, continuing the series might be impossible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 作者はドエススキー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The author is Doesusuki.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次の日の合戦
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battle the next day.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス軍と魔軍の戦い、ランスも参加します。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The fight between the Leazas army and the demon army, Lance participates too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よーし、今日こそはハウゼルを倒すぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, today I’m definitely going to defeat Hauzel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昨日は逃げられたが・・今回は逃がさない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He escaped yesterday... but this time, I won’t let him get away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前線基地でのシーンは　エクス、リックとか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Scenes at the frontline base with Ex, Rick, and others...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とはりきって戦場に入ります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Brimming with enthusiasm, they enter the battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウゼルを発見、戦闘をしかけようとするが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They spot Hauzel and try to initiate combat,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きょろきょろしているだけで、ランスを無視してさーっと飛んでいってしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but Hauzel just looks around, ignores Lance, and swiftly flies away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こらーまてー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey—wait!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これはどういう作戦だ、何かやる気なのか？　くそっ、追いかけるぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What kind of strategy is this? Is he up to something? Damn it, I’m chasing him!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （実は本を捜しているハウゼルさん）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Actually, Hauzel is searching for a book.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場の少し離れた所
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A spot a little apart from the battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 火炎司書とユキちゃんが話をしている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Fire Librarian and Yuki-chan are having a conversation.
